/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with vibrant red lanterns, adding a touch of cultural charm to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is busy with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. The colors in the image are vivid, with the red of the lanterns standing out against the blue sky and the various hues of the buildings.
